<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return a reference to the substring from &#91;Start, Start + N).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// suffix (starting with \\p Start) will be returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring/#abab69c8e9372f6a5283db4a059b8d5a0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#91;&#91;nodiscard&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring/#abab69c8e9372f6a5283db4a059b8d5a0">substr</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Start,</span></CodeLine>
